children.name: Get an overview of your Invoice-to-Pay (ITP) Process

blocks.text: This Dashboard provides a high-level overview of an Invoice-to-Pay (ITP) process. It highlights some key KPIs as well as a high-level analysis of the process to identify areas to investigate further.
Page 1: Discovery - A process model from your event log data, displays the most common process paths
Page 3: Analysis - High-level analysis of key use cases
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
For a more detailed analysis of key process areas, see other available dashboards.

If you feel our Dashboards helped you during your analysis, please share some feedback regarding improvement ideas, wishes, and problems. We always try to improve and extend the Dashboard Templates to provide you with the best experience possible. You can submit your feedback here.

children.name: User Guide - Process Conformance checker widget
children.description: Choose this widget to (a) display various activities (b) map the process against BPMN process model

blocks.text: The aim of Variant Explorer Widget is to discover the various process paths. You can display several variants at a time.
Before you start, make sure that a BPMN model is created via "Generate BPMN" (top right corner) or linked. Read more on how to link a BPMN process in section Create an investigation.
For further information, check Signavio Documentation here.

children.name: Number of Invoices
children.description: Number of all Invoices covered in the Data Set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id)
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Purchase Orders
children.description: Number of all Purchase Orders covered in the Data Set

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT(DISTINCT "PO Number")
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)

children.name: Conformance Rate
children.description: Percentage of cleared Invoices following the pattern 'Vendor creates Invoice' to 'Post Invoice' to 'Due Date past ' to 'Clear Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Maverick Buying Rate
children.description: Definition of 'Maverick Buying': Creating a Purchase Order after an Invoice has already been posted in the system

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Create PO Item')) 
	/ COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Total Value of Invoices
children.description: Total Invoice Amount in USD

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

blocks.text: Below you can check the KPIs that describe current Process state from a particular Use Case perspective

children.name: No-Touch Invoice Processing Rate
children.description: Percentage of cleared Invoices without Change events

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE NOT ( "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' ) )
		AND (event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
)
/ (COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE event_name MATCHES('Clear Invoice'))
	)
* 100
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Number of Open Overdue Invoices
children.description: Invoices with past Due Dates

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Overdue Invoice Value
children.description: Value of Invoices without a Clearing Date and past Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Inv. Converted USD Amount")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Automation Rate Overall
children.description: Percentage of automated events. Events with an undefined User Type are excluded from the scope

children.name: AVG Automation Rate of Posting Events
children.description: Automation Rate of Posting Events, such as 'Post Invoice', 'Payment Posting' and 'Post Credit Memo'

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with Late Payments. Only paid Invoices are included

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Payment Delay
children.description: Average Cycle Time after an Invoice passed the Net Due Date until it gets cleared

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  AVG (
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    ) - (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')
        )
    )
  ) AS PaymentTime
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Early Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cleared Invoices 5 days before reaching the Due Date. Cases with Cash Discounts are excluded.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" - "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" > DURATION '5days'
      ) AND "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  ("Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage1" IS NULL
  		OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" = 0
        OR "Last Inv. Item Cash Discount Percentage2" IS NULL)

children.name: Ã˜ Cycle Time for On-Time Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all invoices  from Posting to Clearing before their Due Date was reached (On-Time Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "Last Inv. Item Due Date" > "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"

children.name: AVG Cycle Time for Late Payments
children.description: Average Cycle Time of all Invoices from posting to clearing after their Due Date was reached (Late Payments)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Due Date passed')))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE event_name Matches ('Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
    AND ("Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date")

children.name: AVG Cycle Time to Clear Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from posting an Invoice to clearing it

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')

children.name: Rate of Invoices with Payment Term Changes
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with Payment Term Changes compared to the total

dataSource.query:
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) FILTER (
	WHERE "Change Type" MATCHES ( 'Update' )
	-- get all PT "changes"
	AND ("Changed Table" MATCHES ('EKKO') OR
	"Changed Table" MATCHES ('BSEG'))
	AND ( "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZTERM')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2T')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD1P')
	OR "Changed Field" MATCHES  ('ZBD2P')
)
)
/ COUNT (DISTINCT CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Rate (%) of Invoices with immediate payment terms"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Change Rate
children.description: Percentage of Invoices including Updates or Changes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            "Change Type" IN ( 'Update' )
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Conformance Level
children.description: Percentage of cleared Invoices following the pattern 'Vendor creates Invoice' to 'Post Invoice' to 'Due Date passed' to 'Clear Invoice'

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  ) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Late Payment Rate Over Time
children.description: Percentage of Average Cycle Time of cleared Invoices with Payments after passing the Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Clear Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Clearing Date",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Conformance Level Over Time
children.description: Percentage of cleared Invoices following the pattern 'Vendor creates Invoice' to 'Post Invoice' to 'Due Date passed' to 'Clear Invoice', based on Posting Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      EVENT_NAME MATCHES (
        'Vendor Creates Invoice' ~> 'Post Invoice' ~> 'Due Date passed' ~> 'Clear Invoice'
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Conformance Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Clear Invoice')
  AND EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Change Rate Over Time
children.description: Percentage of Invoices with Updates or Changes based on posting date

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'month',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
          WHERE
            event_name IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  COUNT (CASE_ID) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        SELECT
          BOOL_OR (
            "Change Type" IN ( 'Update' )
          )
      )
  ) / COUNT (CASE_ID) * 100 AS "Change Rate"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

children.name: Monthly distribution of number of Invoices & Cycle time
children.description: Distribution Overview of number of created Invoices and Average Cycle Time

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Month",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "Number of Invoices",
  AVG(
    (
      SELECT
        LAST ("end_time") FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')
        ) - FIRST ("end_time") FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Avg. Cycle time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  event_name MATCHES ('Post Invoice' ~> 'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH')

children.name: Number of Invoices
children.description: Number of all Invoices covered in the Data Set

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT( case_id)
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Automation Rate Overall
children.description: Percentage of automated events. Events with an undefined User Type are excluded from the scope

children.name: Late Payment Rate
children.description: Percentage of cases with late payments. Only paid Invoices are included

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time Over Months
children.description: Average Cycle Time for all cleared Invoices which got posted in a specific month

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "Invoice Posting Date",
        
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time"
        	
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~>'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: Automation Rate Over Time
children.description: The following KPI reflects the percentage of automated events based on the Invoice Posting Date.

dataSource.query:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC(
    'MONTH',
    (
      SELECT
        LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice')
        )
    )
  ) AS "Invoice Post Date",
  (SUM(
    (
      SELECT
        COUNT (EVENT_NAME) FILTER (
          WHERE
            (
              "Event Created By User Type" IN ('System', 'Service')
            )
        )
    ))
    / SUM((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME))
  )*100) AS "Percentage of automated events"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
WHERE
  EVENT_NAME MATCHES ('Vendor Creates Invoice')
ORDER BY
  1 ASC NULLS FIRST FILL TIMESERIES('MONTH'),
  NULL

blocks.text: This page shows how the main KPIs changing over time.
Hint: Use case specific analysis and are provided in respective Dashboards.

children.name: AVG Cycle Time to Clear Invoices
children.description: Average Cycle Time from posting an Invoice to clearing it

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
        
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "event_name" MATCHES ('Post Invoice'~> 'Clear Invoice')
